Title: Kumo no Gakkou
Description: ["Near the end of the 19th century, a young boy loses his father and has to move from a comfortable city to a poor village in Saitama. There, living with his mother, elder sister, and a dog, he learns valuable lessons about what's truly important in life."]
Related: ['Prequel: Lan Pi Shu Yu Da Lian Mao']
